New Records: Lungi Ngidi became the first bowler in the tournament to dismiss Virat Kohli.
Key Match Events: South Africa won by five wickets.
Lungi Ngidi took four wickets for 29 runs and was awarded player of the match.
Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 runs off 40 balls.
Aiden Markram and David Miller had a 76-run partnership.
David Miller hit consecutive boundaries off Bhuvneshwar Kumar to clinch the win.
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma decided to bat first after winning the toss.
Post-Match Reflections: Temba Bavuma stated that South Africa will keep flying under the radar.
Rohit Sharma acknowledged the match-winning partnership from Markram and Miller and mentioned the team's poor fielding.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's openers failed to score a run off the first nine balls, the longest it had ever taken India to get off the mark in a T20 international.
South Africa moved back to the top of the Super 12 Group 2 table.
